name: 施欣文
objective: 本課程著重教導學生閱讀文章，並藉由文章訓練學生字彙建構、語言解析及聽力會話、思維啟發能力。課中延展活動將閱讀內容與聽力、會話、寫作做進一步的連結，並引導學生將所學做有效的應用。
schedule:
(Estimated)

Week 1: Intro, Read “Why Clay Shirky Banned Laptops, Tablets and Phones from His Classroom”

Do Related vocabulary homework.

(As always, if a reading or assignment is listed here, is must be completed before you come to class. The units from American Headway, listed below, are advisory. I will assign additional American Headway homework in class; please take good notes and contact a friend for the assignment if you are absent. ) 

Unit One—American Headway: What makes us Human? 

Week 2: Unit One—American Headway (cont.) 

Week 3: Unit 2—American Headway: In So Many Words
Articles in your discipline projects/show and tell

Week 4 +5: My Fair Lady

Week 6: Unit 3--Enough is Enough

Week 7: Unit 3

Week 8: Review/Oral exam

Week 9: Midterms

Week 10: Unit 4, Not all it Seems: Show and Tell projects

Week 11: Unit 4

Week  12–13, Unit 5, Culture Clashes

Week 14–15: Fruits of War

Week 16–17: Review and Exam

Week 18: Graduation Requirement Test
scorePolicy:
Homework: 25%
Quizzes/Tests: 25%
Participation, Skits, and Presentations: 20%
Midterm: 15%
Final: 15%

[I believe, however, that the grading categories are set to change in Fall 2018, with more weight on the midterm. The all-student final will be canceled so that students may take their graduation-requirement test. Of course, we will have our own in-class final.]

Please note that cell phones may not be used in my classes. You may read why not on my course website, on the page "Why I have a Screen-Free Policy in Class": https://britamericanlit.wordpress.com/screen-free/.
